pages.text: $(li)The Tinted enchantment can be applied in a Sword, Pickaxe, Shovel, Axe, Hoe, Shears, Bow, Crossbow, Fishing Rod, Trident, Elytra, Pickarang, Helmet, Chestplate, Leggings and Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows changing the color of the enchantment glint using dye in a Anvil.
pages.title: Tinted
